definition: flower vase/fig. just a pretty face/CL:對|对[dui4]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The Qing dynasty vases had been displayed on the window sill for years.
sentences.chinese: 这些清代花瓶已经在展台上展出了很长时间。

sentences.english: She dashed a vase to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她把花瓶猛掷在地板上。

sentences.english: She told Charlie, "I'm grateful for how pretty that vase is."
sentences.chinese: 她对查理说，“这个花瓶太美丽了，我很感激。”

sentences.english: The cat bumped the vase off the shelf .
sentences.chinese: 那猫将花瓶从架上碰落。

sentences.english: The vase crashed when it fell off the bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 那个花瓶从书架上掉了下来，摔碎了。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy a medium-sized cloisonne vase with alight blue background.
sentences.chinese: 俺想买一个中等尺寸的景泰蓝花瓶，底色要淡蓝的。

sentences.english: "There were vases being broken and people climbing over other people and a lot of screaming," Bieber fan Taylor Inder told the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 到处都有花瓶被砸碎，人们相互拥挤着并大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Thick cotton padding embedded the precious vase in its box.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的棉花填塞物紧紧围住装在盒子中的贵重花瓶。

sentences.english: I struggled to steady the large vase.
Those beautiful round multi-coloured Chinese cloisonne vases.
sentences.chinese: 那些漂亮的圆型的多色的中国景泰蓝花瓶。

sentences.english: Stick a vase on the table for those flowers I got.
sentences.chinese: 在桌上放个花瓶，把我摘的花都放进去吧。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy a medium-sized cloisonne vase with alight blue background.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一个中等尺寸的景泰蓝花瓶，底色要淡蓝的。
吕弗勒是我认识的一个花瓶一样的知识分子。

sentences.english: I knocked the vase off the table.
sentences.chinese: 我把花瓶从桌子上碰掉了。

sentences.english: The newly unearthed copper vase is pleasing to the eye and engraved with delicate and intricate traditional designs.
sentences.chinese: 新出土的铜花瓶造型优美，刻有精细复杂的传统图案。
这是个8尺高的装饰花瓶。

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
